description:
Syncfusion Sparkline for Xamarin.Android is tiny chart that helps present trends and variations associated with a measurement– such as average temperature, stock market activity, etc.–in a simple, lightweight, and condensed manner.

Key features:
• Sparkline type: There are four types of sparklines, namely line, column, area, and win loss that are used to show data trends.
• Marker: Highlights data points in line and area sparklines to make it more readable.
• Points highlight: The color of key data points such as first, last, high, and low can be highlighted and customized to denote data usage.
• Range band: Highlights a particular region in a sparkline to show the range of safe values. By setting the minimum and maximum ranges for the range band, the outliers can easily be identified.
• Sparkline axis: Axis of a sparkline can be configured and customized to show the origin of sparkline data points.

Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Android project only.

Learn more: https://www.syncfusion.com/xamarin-android-ui-controls/sparkline?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Documentation: https://help.syncfusion.com/xamarin/maps/overview?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Support:
Incident: https://www.syncfusion.com/support/directtrac/incidents/newincident?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing
Forum: https://www.syncfusion.com/forums/xamarin.android?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

title: Syncfusion Sparkline for Xamarin.Android
